trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents one or more errors that occur during application execution.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If the innerException parameter is not null, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
